reviewText: Incredible documentaries like all of Bruce Parry's work.

This is another excellent documentory from bruce parry. it is possible that this could well be the best iv seen about the arctic regions and the countries in its circle. i rate this a 10 out of 10. so good that i have watched it 3 times already. it is an absolute treat and gem and will keep you fixed to your seat for hours. a must for anyone interested in polar life,travel,history and people
Great documentary, I have seen it on TV. Unfortunately I received a zone 2 blueray movie and cant play it !
